BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY 270200Z OCT TO 030159Z NOV BY
   M/V NPS SANCO STAR AND NPS OCEAN EUROPE TOWING
   200 METER LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   22-18.38S 040-01.33W, 22-21.78S 039-55.90W,
   22-22.80S 039-56.50W, 22-19.47S 040-01.98W,
   22-23.90S 040-01.38W, 22-26.35S 039-57.95W,
   22-27.87S 039-58.93W, 22-25.63S 040-02.35W.
   SEVEN MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 030259Z NOV 12.
